SummaryEnglish: Touka is just your average (slightly perverted) farmer in the village of Cheza. While he daydreams about being a hero and getting the girl, the real hero, Sion, is out battling demons that threaten to invade the world! But one day, Touka accidentally kills the hero…?! With the Legendary Hero dead, who's going to save the world now?! Touka quickly buries Sion's body to hide the evidence, but wakes up the next day to discover he is no longer in his own body…!!

1.TitleEnglish: 特別編［ミリィ・ユニスができるまで］
1.SummaryEnglish: 「勇者が死んだ！」特別編［ミリィ・ユニスができるまで］ ミリイ・ユニス役の新福桜がオーディションを経て初のアフレコに挑むまでを追った特別番組。オーディションの見届人でもありフリードリヒ役の小野賢章との対談も紹介。 詳細情報 出演者 新福桜，小野賢章ほか
Touka Scott doesn't care much about the devils supposedly ravaging the world... until a visit from the legendary hero changes everything.

2.SummaryEnglish: The new hero's party heads out on a devil-hunting quest, but questions arise about new companion Kyle's motivations.

3.TitleEnglish: The Legendary Hero Is a Skeleton!
3.SummaryEnglish: The party makes it to the royal capital in hopes of getting some funds, but Touka will first have to learn to navigate the, er, challenges of his new body...

4.SummaryEnglish: Touka tries to keep up his masquerade around the princess, while a sinister plot moves into motion beneath the capital.

5.SummaryEnglish: Touka and his makeshift party tackle the true terror haunting the capital.

6.TitleEnglish: The Legendary Hero Is a Girl
6.SummaryEnglish: A strange spell turning the townspeople into monsters forces some hard decisions from the hero's party.

7.SummaryEnglish: As Touka and his friends pursue the entity enslaving the townspeople, an encounter with another adventurers' party raises new questions.

8.TitleEnglish: The Legendary Hero Is a Student!
8.SummaryEnglish: The wicked necromancers hire a deadly mercenary to slow the party down, as new revelations arise about Touka's past.

9.SummaryEnglish: Touka awakens in a familiar place—Is it the past? Is it a dream? Whatever it is, he'll need to solve the mystery before time runs out for him and Yuna!

10.TitleEnglish: The Raid of the Legendary Hero
10.SummaryEnglish: The legendary hero's party finally reaches Elvania, while the king makes his own plans to stop the necromancers' plot.

11.TitleEnglish: The Legendary Hero Fights to the Death!
11.SummaryEnglish: It's all coming down to the big climactic battle. Can Touka defeat Diego and save Yuna before time runs out?!

12.TitleEnglish: The Legendary Hero Is a Duo!
12.SummaryEnglish: The situation is dire Touka still won't wake up, even as time ticks down. Will the day be saved, or will the legendary hero end up dead—again?
